# tests

## line

```{r}
library(sparkline)

sparkline(1:100,type="line",height=200,width=400)
```

## bar

```{r}
sparkline(1:100, type="bar", height=200, width=600)
```

## tristate

```{r}
sparkline(c(1,1,0,1,-1,-1,1,-1,0,0,1,1),type="tristate",barWidth=20,barSpacing=2,width=250,height=40)
```

## box

```{r}
sparkline(runif(100),type="box")
```

## bullet

```{r}
sparkline(c(10,12,12,9,7), type="bullet", width=200)
```

## discrete

```{r}
sparkline(c(4,6,7,7,4,3,2,1,4,4), type="discrete", width=200, height=100)
```
